sentences.text: Dear Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to invite you to attend our 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders on Thursday, March 2, 2017 at 2:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will be held at the Sofitel Philadelphia, 120 South 17th Street, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders and the proxy statement describe the items of business for the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the meeting we will also report on AmerisourceBergen's performance and operations during fiscal year 2016 and respond to stockholder questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is very important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, we urge you to vote and to submit your proxy over the Internet, by telephone or by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered stockholder and attend the meeting you may revoke the proxy and vote your shares in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares through a bank or broker and want to vote your shares in person at the meeting, please contact your bank or broker to obtain a legal proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At AmerisourceBergen, we believe that effective governance is critical to a successful long-term strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We remain committed to a strong and independent Board and constructive shareholder engagement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the entire Board, we encourage you to read more about our robust governance structure in the enclosed proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STEVEN H. COLLIS Chairman, President & Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HIGHLIGHTS OF OUR CORPORATE GOVERNANCE PRACTICES AND POLICIES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board consistently seeks to implement leading practices and policies in corporate governance, with emphasis on maintaining the Board's independence to provide effective oversight of management and ensure accountability to our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2016, we took a number of actions to further enhance our governance processes, including the adoption of proxy access for director nominations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Below, we highlight our key corporate governance practices and policies:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors        Independence     The majority of our directors are independent (8 out of 10).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance principles require us to maintain a minimum of 70% independent directors on our Board (see page 7).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independence of Key Oversight Committees     All members of our Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee, Compensation and Succession Planning Committee and Governance and Nominating Committee are independent and meet applicable SEC and NYSE standards (see page 22).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Independent Director      Our corporate governance principles require the election of a Lead Independent Director whenever our Chief Executive Officer also serves as Chairman of the Board and clearly define the Lead Independent Director's authority and significant responsibilities in the governance of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director is elected annually by a majority of the independent directors (see pages 19- 20).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Diversity     Our directors have diverse business experiences, backgrounds and expertise in a wide range of fields, all of which are critical to understanding our businesses, competitive position and risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has a long-standing receptiveness to gender and ethnic diversity (see page 8).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overboarding Policy      Our policy regarding a director's service on the boards of other public companies is more restrictive than most.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our Chief Executive Officer serves as a director, he or she may only serve on the board of one other public company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors should not serve on more than 3 other public company boards (see page 8).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tenure Policy     Our policy for directors' tenure provides that a director will resign at the annual meeting of stockholders following his or her 75th birthday or when his or her employment or principal business association changes materially.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director who is an employee will resign when he or she retires or is no longer employed by us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Succession Planning      We undertake succession planning and maintain an emergency succession plan for our Chief Executive Officer (see page 20).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Refreshment    4 of our 9 non-employee directors have joined the Board in the last 5 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Evaluation Process      Our Board has a comprehensive annual evaluation process for directors and each committee, which is led by the Chair of our Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Either the Chair of our Governance and Nominating Committee or an independent, third-party governance expert interviews each director to obtain his or her assessment of the effectiveness of the Board and the Committees on which he or she serves, as well as director performance and Board dynamics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the interview process was led by the Chair of our Governance and Nominating Committee, who is also our Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The full Board reviews and discusses the results of the evaluation process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance and Nominating Committee and the full Board also conduct an annual review and update of our corporate governance principles and committee charters (see page 21).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents   Risk Oversight     Our full Board and Board committees actively engage in risk management and assessment for all aspects of our business, including our compensation policies and practices, with specific responsibilities for risk oversight designated in the charters for Board committees and our corporate governance principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate officers and senior managers report on risk exposure at regular intervals to the appropriate committee or full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Communication and Engagement      Our corporate governance principles outline the procedures for stockholders to communicate and seek engagement with our Board (see pages 24 and 62).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation        Alignment with Stockholders' Interests      We align executive compensation with AmerisourceBergen Corporation's performance through performance metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also require executives to adhere to stock ownership guidelines and holding requirements that align their interests with those of our stockholders and encourage long-term growth (see page 30).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback     We have the right to claw back the value of cash and equity awards held by current and former executives as a result of misconduct (including misconduct that leads to the restatement of our financial statements) (see page 39).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Compensation Consultant      The consultant to our Compensation and Succession Planning Committee provides no other services to AmerisourceBergen Corporation (see page 28).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rights of Stockholders        Annual Election of Directors      We have declassified our Board so that all directors are elected annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority Vote Standard     Our bylaws and corporate governance principles establish majority voting standards for the election of directors and require each director nominee to tender an irrevocable resignation prior to each annual meeting in the event an incumbent director does not receive the required votes for re-election (see page 21).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Removal of Directors With or Without Cause      Our Board amended our bylaws so that stockholders can remove directors with or without cause and recommended the solicitation of stockholder approval of a conforming amendment to our certificate of incorporation (see page 61).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Right to Call Special Meetings     Stockholders with at least 25% of the outstanding shares of our common stock have the right to call special meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access      A stockholder, or a group of up to 20 stockholders, who have continuously owned at least 3% of our outstanding common stock for 3 years or more may nominate directors to fill up to the greater of 2 or 20% of the available board seats (see page 24).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Say-on- Pay Vote     Our Board previously adopted our stockholders' strong preference for an annual say-on-pay vote and recommends that stockholders again vote in favor of the annual advisory vote on the compensation of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (see page 56).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Supermajority Requirement      Majority vote is required for stockholder action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Poison Pill     Our Board adopted our stockholders' preference to redeem AmerisourceBergen Corporation's "poison pill" stockholder rights agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For further details, please see the full discussion relating to our corporate governance policies and practices and our leadership structure in this proxy statement under the section titled "Corporate Governance."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ABOUT THE 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS AND VOTING AT THE MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why am I being furnished this proxy statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors of AmerisourceBergen Corporation (the "Company," "AmerisourceBergen," "we" or "us") is furnishing this proxy statement in connection with its solicitation of proxies for use at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders to be held on March 2, 2017, and at any adjournments thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended September 30, 2016 accompanies this notice and proxy statement, but is not incorporated as a part of the proxy statement and is not to be regarded as part of the proxy solicitation material.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is soliciting my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors is soliciting your proxy in order to provide you with an opportunity to vote on all matters scheduled to come before the meeting whether o not you attend the meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What if I received a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are providing access to our proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, on or about January 20, 2017, we are mailing to our record and beneficial stockholders a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, which contains instructions on how to access our proxy materials over the Internet and vote online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, you will not receive a printed copy of our proxy materials by mail unless you request one.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may request a printed copy of our proxy materials for the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to receive a printed copy of our proxy materials, you should follow the instructions for requesting those materials included in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote if you owned shares of our common stock ("Common Stock") as of the close of business on January 3, 2017, which is the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are entitled to one vote for each share of Common Stock that you own.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of January 3, 2017, we had 216,991,541 shares of Common Stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What shares can I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote all shares owned by you as of the close of business on January 3, 2017, the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These shares include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares held directly in your name as the stockholder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares of which you are the beneficial owner but not the stockholder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These are shares that are held for you through a broker, trustee or other nominee such as a bank, including shares purchased through any 401(k) plan or our employee stock purchase plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote before the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in your own name as the stockholder of record, you have three options for voting and submitting your proxy before the meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By InternetWe encourage you to vote and submit your proxy over the Internet at www.envisionreports.com/ABC
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By telephoneYou may vote and submit your proxy by calling 1-800-652-VOTE (8683).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By mailIf you received your proxy materials by mail, you may vote by completing, signing and returning the enclosed proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares through an account with a bank, broker or other nominee, you may vote by completing and signing the voting instruction form that the bank, broker or other nominee will provide to you, or by using telephone or Internet voting arrangements described on the voting instruction form, the Notice or other materials that the bank, broker or other nominee will provide to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: May I vote at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares at the meeting if you attend in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares through an account with a bank or broker, you must obtain a legal proxy from the bank or broker in order to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the meeting, we encourage you to vote your shares by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by proxy over the Internet, by telephone or by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I revoke my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are the stockholder of record, you may revoke your proxy at any time before the polls close at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Changing your vote in the manner described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notifying Hyung J. Bak, Secretary, AmerisourceBergen Corporation, 1300 Morris Drive, Chesterbrook, Pennsylvania 19087 in writing that you are revoking your proxy before it is voted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f you hold your shares through an account with a bank or broker, your ability to revoke your proxy depends on the voting procedures of the bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please follow the directions provided to you by your bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: May I change my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may change your vote at any time before the polls close at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may change your vote by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Signing another proxy card with a later date and returning it to us prior to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting again over the Internet or by telephone prior to 2:00 p.m., Eastern Time, on March 2, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting at the meeting if you are the stockholder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting at the meeting if you are the beneficial owner and have obtained a legal proxy from your bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f you hold your shares through an account with a bank or broker, your ability to change your vote depends on the voting procedures of the bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please follow the directions provided to you by your bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What if I return my proxy card but do not provide voting instructions?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy cards that are signed and returned but do not contain instructions will be voted as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the election of the ten nominees for director named on page 7 of this proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the approval, on an advisory basis, of the compensation of our named executive officers as described in this proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the approval, on an advisory basis, of conducting an advisory vote on the compensation of our named executive officers every ye
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the approval of an amendment to our certificate of incorporation to provide for the right of stockholders to remove directors with or without cause; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the best judgment of the individuals named as proxies on the proxy card on any other matters properly brought before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What does it mean if I receive more than one proxy card or instruction form?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It means that you have multiple accounts with our transfer agent and/or banks or brokers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote all of your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recommend that you consolidate as many accounts as possible under the same name and address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For assistance consolidating accounts where you are the stockholder of record, you may contact our transfer agent, Computershare, at 1-866-233-1957.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Will my shares be voted if I do not provide my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f you are a registered stockholder and do not provide a proxy, you must attend the meeting in order to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold shares through an account with a bank or broker, your shares may be voted even if you do not provide voting instructions to your bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Banks and brokers have the authority under the rules of the New York Stock Exchange, or NYSE, to vote shares for which their customers do not provide voting instructions on certain routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm (Item 2 on the Proxy Card) is considered a routine matter for which banks and brokers may vote without specific instructions from their customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: May stockholders ask questions at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of AmerisourceBergen will answer stockholders' questions of general interest at the end of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to be eligible to ask questions at the meeting, you must be able to establish that you are a stockholder either as of January 3, 2017 or as of the date of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes must be present to hold the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order for us to conduct our meeting, a majority of the shares of our Common Stock outstanding as of January 3, 2017 must be present in person or by proxy at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is referred to as a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares are counted as present at the meeting if you attend the meeting and vote in person or if you properly return a proxy over the Internet, by telephone or by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares voted by banks or brokers on behalf of beneficial owners are also counted as present at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, abstentions and broker non-votes will be counted for purposes of establishing a quorum with respect to any matter properly brought before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes occur on a matter when a bank or broker is not permitted under applicable rules and regulations to vote on a matter without nstruction from the beneficial owner of the underlying shares and no instruction has been given.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are needed for each proposal and how are the votes counted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: he affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast will be required for the election of each director (Item 1 on the Proxy Card).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the votes cast means that the votes cast "for" a director exceed the number of votes cast "against" that director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are disregarded when determining if a majority of the votes have been cast in favor of a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of a majority of the shares present in person or by proxy and entitled to vote will be required for:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the current fiscal year (Item 2 on the Proxy Card);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The approval, on an advisory basis, of the compensation of our named executive officers as described in this proxy statement (Item 3 on the Prox Card);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The approval, on an advisory basis, of the frequency of a stockholder vote on the compensation of our named executive officers (Item 4 on the Proxy Card); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any other proposal that might properly come before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of the holders of a majority of the shares of our Common Stock outstanding will be required to approve the proposed amendment to our certificate of incorporation (Item 5 on the Proxy Card).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will be counted toward the tabulation of votes cast on Items 2, 3, 4 and 5, and will have the effect of negative votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under NYSE rules, Item 2 is considered a routine matter on which brokers will be permitted to vote in their discretion even if the beneficial owners do not provide voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, Items 1, 3, 4 and 5 are not considered routine matters under NYSE rules, and brokers will not be permitted to vote on Items 1, 3, 4 and 5 unless the beneficial owners provide voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Shareholders Agreement between AmerisourceBergen and Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (as successor in interest to Walgreen Co. and Alliance Boots GmbH), Walgreens Boots Alliance has the right to designate a director to our Board once Walgreens Boots Alliance and certain of its subsidiaries collectively own five percent or more of our Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On May 1, 2014, Walgreens Boots Alliance notified us that they had acquired at least five percent of our Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Barra, Co-Chief Operating Officer of Walgreens Boots Alliance, has been designated by Walgreens Boots Alliance to serve on our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She was appointed to the Board on January 16, 2015 and is a current nominee for election as director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, upon the acquisition in full by Walgreens Boots Alliance and its subsidiaries of 19,859,795 shares of AmerisourceBergen in the open market, Walgreens Boots Alliance will be entitled to designate a second director to the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For so long as Walgreens Boots Alliance has a right to designate a director to the Board, subject to certain exceptions, including matters related to acquisition proposals, Walgreens Boots Alliance and its subsidiaries will be obligated to vote their shares in accordance with our Board on all matters submitted to a vote of our stockholders.

sentences.text: Has AmerisourceBergen adopted a code of ethics and business conduct that applies to directors, officers and employees?

sentences.text: The Board of Directors adopted our Code of Ethics and Business Conduct in May 2004.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We review and revise the Code of Ethics and Business Conduct from time to time, most recently in March 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It applies to directors and employees, including officers, and is intended to comply with the requirements of Section 303A.10 of the NYSE Listed Company Manual.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any waivers of the application of the Code of Ethics and Business Conduct to directors or executive officers must be approved by either the Board of Directors or the Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will disclose any such waiver or amendment of the Code of Ethics and Business Conduct promptly on our website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It applies to our President and Chief Executive Officer, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer and Senior Vice President and Corporate Controller.

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is our leadership structure?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In March 2016 the Board determined that naming Steven H. Collis as Chairman of the Board and naming Dr. Jane E. Henney as Lead Independent Director is the governance structure best suited to enable our Board and management to carry out their responsibilities to our stockholders and promote the growth of AmerisourceBergen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, our employees conduct our business under the direction of our Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer and with the independent oversight of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To enhance its oversight function, our Board is composed of directors who are not employed by us, with the exception of Mr. Collis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board provides guidance and critical review of our governance, strategic initiatives, talent management and risk management processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board ensures that we have an effective management team in place to run our business and serves to protect and advance the long-term interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The role of our senior executives is to develop and implement a strategic business plan for AmerisourceBergen and to grow our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why have we named Mr. Collis as Chairman and Dr. Henney as Lead Independent Director?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that our leadership structure is in the best interests of AmerisourceBergen and its stockholders and that it fosters innovative, responsive and strong leadership for the Company as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board determined that the election of an executive Chairman must be accompanied by the election of a strong Lead Independent Director with a clearly defined and dynamic leadership role in the governance of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe the structure promotes, through the clearly articulated roles and responsibilities of the Lead Independent Director and Board committees, the objective and effective oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Serving as both Chairman and Chief Executive Officer enables Mr. Collis to effectively and efficiently execute our strategic initiatives, and to respond to challenges and changes in both U.S. and international markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to her extensive knowledge of the healthcare industry and regulatory environment, Dr. Henney has a thorough understanding of the Board's oversight role and leading corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Lead Independent Director, Dr. Henney provides assertive, independent leadership in the boardroom.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are the responsibilities of the Chairman and the Lead Independent Director?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman's primary responsibility is to set the agenda for the Board and to facilitate communications among our directors and between the Board and senior management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer, Mr. Collis ensures that the Board's agenda and discussions address strategic planning as well as key business issues and risks that he encounters in daily operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our governance structure establishes a dynamic leadership role for the Lead Independent Director, which, together with independent Committee leadership, provides a meaningful counterbalance to the executive Chairman and maintains independent and effective oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key aspects of this structure include: if the Chairman is not an independent member of the Board, a majority of the independent directors shall elect a Lead Independent Director annually, subject to his or her continuing reelection and status as an independent director; the Lead Independent Director has clearly articulated and extensive authority and responsibilities in the Board's governance and functions; our Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee, the Compensation and Succession Planning Committee and the Governance and Nominating Committee are each chaired by and comprised solely of independent directors; and our non-employee directors are encouraged to, and often do, have direct contact with our senior managers outside the presence of our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director's authority is as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: presides at all meetings of the Board at which the Chairman is not present;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: calls, sets the agenda for and chairs executive sessions of the non-employee directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: has authority to call a Board meeting and/or a meeting of non-employee directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approves Board meeting agendas and schedules to ensure that there is sufficient time for discussion of all agenda items;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: meets one-on-one with the Chairman after each regularly scheduled Board meeting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serves as a liaison between the Chairman and the non-employee directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serves on the Executive Committee;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: advises the Chairs of the Board committees and assists them in the management of their workloads;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: with the Chair of the Compensation and Succession Planning Committee, takes a leading role in succession planning for the Chief Executive Officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: supports the Chair of the Governance and Nominating Committee in overseeing the annual self-assessment process for the Board and each committee, interviewing and recommending candidates for the Board, and recommending Board committee assignments;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is available for communication and consultation with major stockholders upon request on appropriate topics; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: performs such other functions and responsibilities as set forth in our corporate governance principles or as requested by the Board or the non- executive directors from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board conducts annual evaluations, under the oversight of our Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Succession Planning Committee, in accordance with its charter and under the oversight of the Lead Independent Director, will annually review the performance of, and succession plan for, the Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These processes provide our Board with opportunities to examine and reassess the effectiveness of our leadership structure, including the performance of our Chairman and Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are the standing Committees of the Board?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are five standing committees of the Board: the Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee, the Compensation and Succession Planning Committee, the Executive Committee, the Finance Committee and the Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board committees, with the exception of the Executive Committee and the Finance Committee, are required to be composed entirely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Executive Committee, which is composed of our Chairman of the Board, the Lead Independent Director and the Chairs of the other standing committees, has the authority to act between regularly scheduled meetings of the Board, subject to applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board serves as the Chair of the Executive Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that changin committee assignments from time to time strengthens our corporate governance practices and enhances each committee's objective review of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What orientation and educational opportunities does AmerisourceBergen provide for our directors?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide our directors with comprehensive orientation and continuing education, which is overseen by the Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director orientation familiarizes the directors with our business and strategic plans, significant financial, accounting and risk management issues, compliance programs and other controls, policies, principal officers and internal auditors, and our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The orientation also addresses Board procedures, our corporate governance principles and our Board committee charters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We offer continuing education programs and provide opportunities to attend commercial director education seminars to assist our directors in maintaining their expertise in areas related to the work of the Board and the directors' committee assignments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, some of our directors have completed
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: executive education programs for directors as part of their continuing education.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide our directors with full membership to the National Association of Corporate Directors to provide a forum for them to maintain their insight into leading governance practices and exchange ideas with peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Henney in 2011 and 2012 and Ms. Hyle in 2015 were named to the "NACD Directorship 100", an annual honor sponsored by the National Association of Corporate Directors to recognize influential directors and others who impact corporate governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How is the Board's performance evaluated?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a comprehensive annual evaluation policy and process in place for the Board and each of its committees, which is led by the Chair of our Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As required by our corporate governance principles, the evaluation occurs annually in advance of the Board's November meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Either the Chair of our Governance and Nominating Committee or an independent, third-party governance expert interviews each director to obtain his or her assessment of the effectiveness of the Board and the Committees on which he or she serves, as well as director performance and Board dynamics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the interview process was led by the Chair of our Governance and Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In advance of the interview, each member of a committee receives a questionnaire soliciting feedback regarding the committee's performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the interview, each member is asked to provide an assessment of the Board's and the relevant committee's performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also solicit suggestions for improving the Board's and the committee's performance, dynamics, time- management, and functioning, as well as proposed topics of focus for the Board and the committee in the upcoming year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of the individual interviews and assessments are aggregated in a report, which the Chair of the Governance and Nominating Committee presents to the full Board for review, discussion and determination of action items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual review in November by the Board of the corporate governance principles and by each committee of its charter is a further step in the evaluation process through which the directors consider leading corporate governance practices for the Board as a whole and identify new areas of focus for the different committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The full Board reviews and discusses recommended revisions to the corporate governance principles and committee charters prior to voting on their approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Has AmerisourceBergen adopted corporate governance principles for the Board of Directors?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted our corporate governance principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Together with the charters of the Board committees, they provide the framework for the governance of AmerisourceBergen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance principles clearly delineate the authority and roles of the Chairman of the Board and the Lead Independent Director in the leadership of the Board, mandate the independence of the committee Chairs and all the members of our audit, compensation and governance committees, and affirm non-employee directors' access to managers and associates outside the presence of our executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance principles address a variety of governance issues in addition to the leadership structure, including those discussed under the headings "Election of Directors," "Additional Information about the Directors, the Board and the Board Committees," "Codes of Ethics" and "Stockholder Engagement."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board reviews and updates the corporate governance principles and the committee charters from time to time to reflect leading corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can stockholders find our corporate governance documents?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance principles and the charters of the Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee, the Compensation and Succession Planning Committee, the Finance Committee and the Governance and Nominating Committee have been posted under the Investors section of our Internet website at www.amerisourcebergen.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Do we have a majority vote standard for director elections and a director resignation policy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws and corporate governance principles provide for a majority vote standard for the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the majority vote standard, each director must be elected by a majority of the votes cast by the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A "majority of the votes cast" means that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the number of votes cast "for" a candidate for director must exceed the number of votes cast "against" that director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A plurality voting standard will apply instead of a majority voting standard if:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder has provided us with notice of a nominee for director in accordance with our bylaws; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That nomination has not been withdrawn on or prior to the day next preceding the date the Company first provides its notice of meeting for such meeting to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Delaware law, if an incumbent nominee for director in an uncontested election does not receive the required votes for re-election, the director remains in office until a successor is elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws and corporate governance principles require each director nominee to tender an irrevocable esignation prior to the applicable meeting of stockholders and include post-election procedures in the event an incumbent director does not receive the required votes for re-election, as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance and Nominating Committee shall make a recommendation to the Board as to whether to accept the previously tendered resignation of the director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will act on the Governance and Nominating Committee's recommendation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board expects the director whose resignation is under consideration to abstain from participating in any decision regarding that resignation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Has the Board determined which of the directors are independent?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that, except for Ms. Barra and Mr. Collis, all of the directors are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance principles require us to maintain a minimum of 70% independent directors on our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the ten director nominees are elected at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, eight out of ten directors then serving will be independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted guidelines in our corporate governance principles to assist it in making independence determinations, which meet or exceed the independence requirements set forth in the NYSE listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These guidelines are contained in Section 5 of our corporate governance principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a director to be considered independent, the Board must determine that the director does not have any direct or indirect material relationship with AmerisourceBergen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the assistance of legal counsel, our Board reviewed the applicable legal standards for director and Board committee member independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In undertaking its review, the Board considered that some of our directors serve on the board of directors or as executive officers of companies for which we perform (or may seek to perform) drug distribution and other services in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of this review, the Board has determined that each of the following directors is independent: Douglas R. Conant, D. Mark Durcan, Richard W. Gochnauer, Lon R. Greenberg, Jane E. Henney, M.D., Kathleen W. Hyle, Michael J. Long and Henry W. McGee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has also determined that each of the members of our Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee, Compensation and Succession Planning Committee and Governance and Nominating Committee are independent, in accordance with the independence requirements set forth in their charters and, as applicable, SEC rules and NYSE listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of the members of these committees receives any consulting or advisory fee from us other than compensation as non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the Board oversee our risk management process?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board executes its oversight responsibility for risk management directly and through its committees, as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee, or Audit Committee, has primary responsibility for monitoring our internal audit, corporate, financial and regulatory risk assessment and risk management processes and overseeing our system of internal controls and financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discusses specific risk areas throughout the year, including those that may arise in various business units and the measures taken by management to monitor and limit risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee oversees the development and implementation of our enterprise risk management program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee receives regular reports throughout the year on matters related to risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At each regularly scheduled meeting, the Audit Committee receives reports from our
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) external auditor on the status of audit activities and findings; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) chief audit executive (who reports directly to the Audit Committee) on the status of the internal audit plan, audit results and any corrective action taken in response to audit findings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a Chief Compliance Officer who oversees our corporate compliance program, including training on and monitoring compliance with our Code of Ethics and Business Conduct and the Company's reporting, investigation and corrective action program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also have an internal Compliance Committee composed of senior executives, including our Chief Compliance Officer and Chief Compliance Counsel, which supports the Chief Compliance Officer in fulfilling his responsibilities and driving corporate adherence to our compliance program, Code of Ethics and Business Conduct and related policies and procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chief Compliance Officer and Chief Compliance Counsel provide reports to the Audit Committee throughout the year on corporate compliance matters, the status of our compliance programs, calls to our hotline and any other material developments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board's other committees oversee risks associated with their respective areas of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, the Compensation and Succession Planning Committee assesses risks associated with our compensation policies and programs for executives as well as employees generally.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Finance Committee discusses risks relating to our capital structure, financing activities, dividend and tax policy and share repurchase activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Board committee reports to the Board at every regular Board meeting on the topics discussed and actions taken at the most recent committee meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board discusses the risks and exposures, if any, involved in the matters or recommendations of the committees, as necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considers specific risk topics throughout the year, including risks associated with our business plan, operational efficiency, strategic objectives, government regulation, investment opportunities, physical facilities, information technology infrastructure and capital structure, among many others.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each fiscal quarter, our Chief Financial Officer reports to the Board on AmerisourceBergen's financial performance and discusses how actual performance compares to our business plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate officers and the leaders of our principal business units report regularly to the Board about the risks and exposures related to their areas of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is informed about and regularly discusses our risk profile, including legal, regulatory and operational risks to our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Has management conducted a risk assessment of AmerisourceBergen's employee compensation policies and practices?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have conducted an internal risk assessment of our employee compensation policies and practices, including those relating to our executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have concluded that our compensation policies and practices do not create risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on AmerisourceBergen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have reviewed our risk analysis with the Compensation and Succession Planning Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The risk assessment process included, among other things, a review of all key incentive compensation plans to ensure that they are aligned with our pay-for-performance philosophy and include performance metrics that support corporate goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The objective of the process was to identify any compensation plans and practices that may encourage employees to take unnecessar risks that could threaten the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No such plans or practices were identified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, various factors mitigate the risk profile of our compensation programs, including, among others:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance targets under our cash incentive programs are tied to a number of different financial metrics so employees will not place undu emphasis on any particular metric at the expense of other aspects of our business;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maximum caps on payouts have been established for our annual cash incentive programs, including under our cash bonus plan used for senior management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity awards under our performance plan for senior executives have maximum caps and are forfeited entirely if the threshold performance metrics are not achieved;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance plan ties 40% of a senior executive's annual equity award to financial performance metrics achieved over a three-year period to ensure that our senior executives are accountable for long-term measures of success;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The remaining 60% of a senior executive's annual equity award (in stock options and restricted stock units) vests over a number of years to encourage senior executives to focus on long-term growth and creating value for stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock ownership requirements align the interests of our senior management with those of our stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have effective management processes for developing annual business plans and a strong system of internal financial controls; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broad-based group of functions, including human resources, finance and legal, oversees aspects of our cash and equity incentive program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STOCKHOLDER ENGAGEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What efforts has AmerisourceBergen made to engage with stockholders?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We value open communications with our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The goal of our engagement and outreach efforts is to ensure that we work collaboratively to educate our investors about our business and governance practices as well as to identify issues of importance to our stockholders and our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our investor relations team regularly shares with our Board and senior executives the feedback that they have received from our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On an ongoing basis, we communicate with the investment community and stockholders about AmerisourceBergen's financial performance, operations and strategic developments through the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quarterly earnings releases and quarterly earnings release conference calls and webcasts;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Regular reports filed with the SEC, including annual and quarterly reports;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Conference calls and webcasts related to specific developments; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual stockholders meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, in 2016 we communicated with several of our largest stockholders through conference calls and in-person meetings in order to seek their input on a variety of topics, including Board structure and proxy access for director nominations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance principles, which were revised in November 2016, describe the procedures through which stockholders may seek direct engagement with Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While management, through our President and Chief Executive Officer and our investor relations team, ordinarily engages with stockholders, the Chairman of the Board, in consultation with the Lead Independent Director, will review and consider, on a case-by-case basis, stockholder requests for meetings with the Board of Directors related to key areas of Board oversight and determine whether such meetings would be appropriate and beneficial.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may communicate their views directly to the Board by writing to Hyung J. Bak, Secretary, AmerisourceBergen Corporation, 1300 Morris Drive, Chesterbrook, Pennsylvania 19087.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STOCKHOLDER RECOMMENDATIONS FOR DIRECTOR NOMINEES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What process should a stockholder follow to propose nominees for consideration by the Governance and Nominating Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The advance notice provision for nomination of directors in our bylaws allows a stockholder to propose nominees for consideration by the Governance and Nominating Committee by submitting specified information concerning itself and the proposed nominee, including the name, appropriate biographical information and qualifications of the proposed nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This and other information required under the advance notice provision must be provided to us in writing to: Hyung J Bak, Secretary, AmerisourceBergen Corporation, 1300 Morris
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Drive, Chesterbrook, Pennsylvania 19087, no earlier than November 2, 2017 and no later than December 2, 2017 to be considered for the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy access provision in our bylaws allows an eligible stockholder or group of no more than 20 eligible stockholders that has maintained continuous ownership of 3% or more of our Common Stock for at least three years to include in our proxy materials for an annual meeting of stockholders a number of director nominees up to the greater of two or 20% of the directors then in office.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Loaned stock that can be recalled within three days may count towards an eligible stockholder's 3% beneficial ownership requirement, which must be maintained at least until the annual meeting at which the proponent's nominee will be considered.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy access nominees who do not receive at least a 25% vote in favor of election will be ineligible as a nominee for the following two years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provisions in the Shareholders Agreement with Walgreens Boots Alliance would not permit Walgreens Boots Alliance to use proxy access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any stockholder proposes a director nominee under our advance notice provision, we are not required to include any proxy access nominee in our proxy statement for the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information required under the proxy access provision must be provided to us in writing to: Hyung J. Bak, Secretary, AmerisourceBergen Corporation, 1300 Morris Drive, Chesterbrook, Pennsylvania 19087, no earlier than August 23, 2017 and no later than September 22, 2017 to be considered for the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering any nominee proposed by a stockholder in accordance with the requirements set forth in our bylaws, the Governance and Nominating Committee will reach a conclusion based on the nominee evaluation criteria described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After full consideration, the stockholder proponent will be notified of the decision of the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AUDIT MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Financial Expert
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has determined that each of Ms. Hyle, Mr. Durcan and Mr. Greenberg is an "audit committee financial expert" as defined in Item 407(d)(5) of Regulation S-K.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Hyle serves as Chair of the Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A description of the financial expertise of Ms. Hyle, Mr. Durcan and Mr. Greenberg accompanies their biographies on pages 12, 10 and 11, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Report of the Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee consists of the four directors named at the end of this report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the committee members are independent (as independence is defined in Section 303A of the NYSE Listed Company Manual and our corporate governance principles) and all of the members are financially literate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of its oversight responsibilities, in 2015 the committee participated in the selection of a new lead audit partner for the Company's independent registered public accounting firm, which is required under the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 to rotate its lead audit partner every five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The process for selecting the new lead audit partner involved an assessment of many factors, including the candidates' independence, business judgment, demonstrated leadership ability, communication skills, multinational experience, ability to leverage the resources of the firm and commitment to continuous improvement in the audit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The selection process also involved discussions between the committee and management regarding potential candidates and a meeting between the Chair of the committee and the chosen candidate for the role.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee reviewed and discussed with AmerisourceBergen's management and its independent registered public accounting firm the audited financial statements contained in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended September 30, 2016 and our internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AmerisourceBergen's management has the primary responsibility for the Company's financial statements and its financial reporting and control processes and procedures, including its internal control over financial reporting and its disclosure controls and procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AmerisourceBergen's management has represented to the Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee that the financial statements contained in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for fiscal year 2016 were prepared in accordance with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles and that our internal control over financial reporting was effective as of September 30, 2016 (based on the criteria set forth in the 2013 Internal Control-Integrated Framework issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee discussed with the Company's independent registered public accounting firm, which is responsible for expressing an opinion on the conformity of the audited financial statements with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles, the firm's judgments as to the quality, not just the acceptability, of the Company's accounting principles, the reasonableness of significant judgments reflected in the financial statements and the clarity of disclosures in the financial statements as well as such other matters as are required to be discussed with the committee under the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee discussed with the Company's independent registered public accounting firm the matters required to be discussed by the PCAOB Auditing Standard No. 1301, "Communication with Audit Committees."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the committee discussed with the independent registered public accounting firm the firm's independence from the Company and its management, including the matters in the written disclosures and letter that were received by the committee from the independent registered public accounting firm as required by applicable requirements of the PCAOB regarding the independent registered public accounting firm's communications with the committee concerning independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also discussed with the Company's independent registered public accounting firm, the firm's audit of the effectiveness of the Company's internal control over financial reporting as of September 30, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the reviews and discussions referred to above, the Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee recommended to the Board of Directors that the audited financial statements be included in AmerisourceBergen's Annual Report on Form 10-K for fiscal year 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AUDIT AND CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY COMMITTEE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kathleen W. Hyle, Chair D. Mark Durcan Lon R. Greenberg Michael J. Long
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Policy for Pre-Approval of Audit and Non-Audit Services
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee's policy is to pre-approve all audit services and all non-audit services that the Company's independent registered public accounting firm is permitted to perform for the Company under applicable federal securities regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As permitted by the applicable regulations, the committee's policy utilizes a combination of specific pre-approval on a case-by-case basis of individual engagements of the independent registered public accounting firm and general pre-approval of certain categories of engagements up to predetermined dollar thresholds that are reviewed annually by the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specific pre-approval is mandatory for the annual financial statement audit engagement, among others.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm's Fees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the fiscal years ended September 30, 2016 and 2015, Ernst & Young LLP, AmerisourceBergen's independent registered public accounting firm, billed the Company the fees set forth below in connection with services rendered by the independent registered public accounting firm to the Company:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fee Category Fiscal Year 2016   Fiscal Year 2015   Audit Fees     $ 6,799,000    $ 7,368,000  Audit-Related Fees     307,000    252,000          Tax Fees       1,881,000      2,132,000  All Other Fees     2,000    2,000          TOTAL     $ 8,989,000    $ 9,754,000
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit fees consisted of fees for the audit of AmerisourceBergen's annual financial statements, consultation concerning financial accounting and reporting standards and consultation concerning matters relating to Section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, reviews of quarterly financial statements as well as services normally provided in connection with statutory and regulatory filings or engagements, comfort letters, consents and assistance with and review of Company documents filed with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit fees also included fees for the audit of the effectiveness of the Company's internal control over financial reporting as required by Section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit-related fees consisted of fees for assurance and related services, including employee benefit plan audits and due diligence related to acquisitions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax fees consisted of fees for services related to tax compliance, tax advice and tax planning services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other fees consisted of subscription fees for Internet-based professional literature.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit and Corporate Responsibility Committee reviewed and approved all fees charged by Ernst & Young LLP in accordance with the policy described above and monitored the relationship between audit and permissible non-audit services provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy is intended to ensure that the fees earned by Ernst & Young LLP are consistent with the maintenance of the independent registered public accounting firm's independence in the conduct of its auditing functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RATIFICATION OF APPOINTMENT OF ERNST & YOUNG LLP AS AMERISOURCEBERGEN'S INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM FOR FISCAL YEAR 2017 (Item 2 on the Proxy Card)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What am I voting on?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are voting on the ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as AmerisourceBergen's independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Board of Directors has appointed Ernst & Young LLP to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although our governing documents do not require the submission of the appointment of AmerisourceBergen's independent registered public accounting firm to the stockholders for approval, the Board considers it desirable that the stockholders ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Should the stockholders not ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as AmerisourceBergen's independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2017, the Audit Committee will investigate the reasons and will reconsider the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the oversight relationship between the Audit Committee and our external auditor?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under its charter, the Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of AmerisourceBergen's external auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To execute this responsibility, the Audit Committee engages
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in a comprehensive annual evaluation of the external auditor's qualifications, performance and independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with SEC rules, audit partners are subject to rotation requirements to limit the number of consecutive years an individual partner may provide service to AmerisourceBergen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For lead and concurring audit partners, the maximum number of consecutive years of service in that capacity is five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews the process that we and Ernst & Young LLP undertake to ensure the rotation of the audit partner responsible for reviewing the audit, and evaluates the qualifications and experience of the individual selected to serve as lead partner for our audit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLP has been retained as AmerisourceBergen's external auditor since 2001.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members of the Audit Committee believe that the continued retention of Ernst & Young LLP to serve as our external auditor is in the best interests of AmerisourceBergen and its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What services will the independent registered public accounting firm provide?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit services provided by Ernst & Young LLP for fiscal year 2017 will include examination of the consolidated financial statements of AmerisourceBergen and services related to periodic SEC filings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit services for fiscal year 2017 also will include the audit of the effectiveness of our internal control over financial reporting as required by Section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, Ernst & Young LLP may provide audit-related, tax and other services comparable in nature to the services performed in fiscal years 2015 and 2016, as described under the heading Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm's Fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Will representatives of the independent registered public accounting firm be present at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Ernst & Young LLP are expected to be present at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such representatives will have an opportunity to make a statement and will be available to respond to appropriate questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the Board of Directors recommend that I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recommend that you vote For the ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as AmerisourceBergen's independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION COMMITTEE MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation and Succession Planning Committee, or the Committee, is composed of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee is responsible for the design of our executive compensation program and review of succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee reviews and approves the compensation of our executives, including our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also oversees our employee pension, long-term incentive and savings, health and welfare plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overview
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AmerisourceBergen Corporation is one of the largest global pharmaceutical sourcing and distribution services companies, helping both healthcare providers and pharmaceutical and biotech manufacturers improve patient access to products and enhance patient care.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of our executive compensation program is to attract, motivate and retain the individuals who lead our Company and align their interests with the long-term interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our fiscal year 2016 named executive officers were:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Steven H. Collis  Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James D. Frary  Executive Vice President and President, AmerisourceBergen Specialty Group (ABSG) Robert P. Mauch  Executive Vice President and President, AmerisourceBergen Drug Corporation (ABDC)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek to pay our executives fairly and competitively and to link pay with performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The main elements of our compensation program are base salary, a short-term incentive in the form of an annual cash bonus, and long-term equity incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We emphasize compensation opportunities that reward our executives when they deliver targeted financial results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of our executives' compensation is equity-based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal year 2016, incentive compensation (annual cash bonus and equity incentive awards) accounted for approximately 87% of Mr. Collis's total direct compensation opportunity (base salary, annual cash bonus and equity incentive awards) and approximately 79% of the average total direct compensation opportunity of the other named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Say-On-Pay Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In March 2016, our stockholders overwhelmingly approved the compensation of our named executive officers, with approximately 96% of stockholder votes cast in favor of our 2016 say-on-pay resolution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, we continued to emphasize our pay for performance culture and did not make any significant changes to our pay program in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Succession Planning Committee (the "Compensation Committee") reviewed our executive compensation peer group and continued to align the transition of pay opportunities for our executives with our compensation philosophy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee also approved performance metrics for incentive pay that were designed to correlate with the way we evaluate our operational results and reflect measures of performance that we believe drive returns for our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
