sentences.text: APPROVAL OF AN AMENDMENT TO AMERISOURCEBERGEN'S AMENDED AND RESTATED CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION TO PROVIDE FOR THE RIGHT OF STOCKHOLDERS TO REMOVE DIRECTORS WITH OR WITHOUT CAUSE (Item 5 on the Proxy Card)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What am I voting on?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are voting on an amendment to the Company's amended and restated certificate of incorporation (our "certificate of amendment") that would conform our certificate of incorporation to the Company's bylaws and allow directors to be removed by the stockholders with or without cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why is this being voted on now?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our certificate of incorporation currently provides that directors may be removed by the stockholders only for cause and only by the affirmative vote of the majority of the voting power of the shares present and entitled to vote at a meeting of the Company's stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2016, our Board of Directors voted to amend our bylaws to provide that the Company's directors may be removed with or without cause by the stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board took this action in light of a December 2015 decision by the Delaware Court of Chancery.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, the court held that if a Delaware corporation has neither a staggered board nor cumulative voting in the election of directors, provisions of the corporation's certificate of incorporation and bylaws providing that directors may be removed only "for cause" are contrary to Section 141(k) of the General Corporation Law of the State of Delaware and are therefore invalid and unenforceable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors approved in January 2016, and now recommends that the stockholders adopt, an amendment to our certificate of incorporation that provides that directors may be removed with or without cause by the holders of a majority of the shares of our Common Stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The certificate of amendment to our certificate of incorporation is attached to this proxy statement as Appendix B, and is incorporated herein by reference.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What provisions of our certificate of incorporation will be amended?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 5.05 of our certificate of incorporation currently allows directors to be removed only for cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 5.05 would be amended to remove the "for cause" requirement, thus allowing directors to be removed with or without cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When will the amendment be effective?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If approved, the proposed amendment to our certificate of incorporation would become effective upon the filing of the certificate of amendment with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware, which the Company would do as soon as practicable after stockholder approval is obtained for the proposed amendment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are needed for this proposal and how are the votes counted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of the proposed amendment to our certificate of incorporation will require the affirmative vote of the holders of a majority of the shares of our Common Stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will be counted toward the tabulation of votes cast on this matter and will have the effect of negative votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes also will have the effect of negative votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no appraisal or similar rights of dissenters under Delaware law with respect to the amendment to our certificate of incorporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the Board of Directors recommend that I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board unanimously recommends that you vote "FOR" the amendment to our certificate of incorporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SUPPLEMENTAL INFORMATION: GAAP TO NON-GAAP RECONCILIATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We publicly disclose certain non-GAAP financial measurements because management uses these non-GAAP measures for business planning purposes, including managing our business against internal projected results of operations and measuring our performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also use these non-GAAP measures to determine incentive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presented non-GAAP financial measures exclude items that management does not believe reflect the Company's core operating performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The non-GAAP financial measures should be viewed in addition to, and not in lieu of, financial measures calculated in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recurring adjustments made to arrive at these non-GAAP financial measures included Warrants expense; gain from antitrust litigation settlements; LIFO expense; acquisition-related intangibles amortization; and employee severance, litigation and other expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also adjusted for a non-recurring charge related to a pension settlement and an impairment charge on an equity investment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We present these supplemental measures because we believe that these measures provide investors with important supplemental information with which to evaluate our performance on the same basis as management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These supplemental performance measures may vary from, and may not be comparable to, similarly titled measures by other companies in our industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have defined the non-GAAP financial measure of adjusted diluted earnings per share as follows: diluted earnings per share, excluding the impact of the accounting dilution of the Warrants prior to their exercise, the shares purchased under our special share repurchase programs, net of the weighted average number of shares issued related to the March 2016 and August 2016 Warrants exercises, and the related interest expense incurred in connection with the $600 million of 1.150% senior notes due in May 2017, issued by the Company solely in connection with the special share repurchase programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted diluted earnings per share also excludes the per share impact of recurring adjustments including Warrants expense; gain from antitrust litigation settlements; LIFO expense; acquisition-related intangibles amortization; employee severance, litigation and other; a non-recurring charge related to a pension settlement and an impairment charge on an equity investment; in each case net of the tax effect calculated using the applicable effective tax rate for those items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We prepare adjusted diluted earnings per share to eliminate the items that we consider to not be indicative of our ongoing operating performance due to their inherent unusual, non-operating, unpredictable, or non-recurring nature.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have defined the non-GAAP financial measure of free cash flow as net cash provided by operating activities minus capital expenditures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have defined the non-GAAP financial measure of adjusted operating income margin as adjusted operating income divided by revenue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CERTIFICATE OF AMENDMENT OF AMENDED AND RESTATED CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION OF AMERISOURCEBERGEN CORPORATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AmerisourceBergen Corporation, a corporation organized and existing under and by virtue of the General Corporation Law of the State of Delaware (the "DGCL"),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DOES HEREBY CERTIFY:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FIRST:    That the Board of Directors of AmerisourceBergen Corporation (the "Corporation"), at a meeting held on January 22, 2016, duly adopted resolutions setting forth a proposed amendment of the Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation of the Corporation, declaring the amendment to be advisable, and directing that the amendment be submitted to the stockholders of the Corporation for consideration at the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The resolution setting forth the proposed amendment is as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation of the Corporation be amended by changing Section 5.05 of Article V so that this section will read as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 5.05.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Removal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any director may be removed, with or without cause, by the affirmative vote of the holders of a majority of the shares then entitled to vote at an election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of any increase or decrease in the authorized number of directors, each director then serving as such shall nevertheless continue as a director until the expiration of his or her current term, or his or her earlier death, resignation or removal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SECOND:    That the amendment was duly adopted in accordance with the provisions of Section 242 of the DGCL.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
